Frisbee golf (also known as disc golf, frolf, or Folf) is a flying disc sport in which players throw a disc at a target; it is played using rules similar to golf.

Frisbee golf is a flying disc game, as well as a precision and accuracy sport, in which individual players throw a flying disc at a target. According to the Professional Disc Golf Association, "The object of the game is to traverse a course from beginning to end in the fewest number of throws of the disc."
